comments.description: Great article! Running has indeed improved my overall health and well-being.
I started running last year, and it's amazing how it positively impacted my mental health too.
This is inspiring! Planning to train for my first triathlon this year. Any tips for beginners?
Triathlon training can be challenging, but the sense of accomplishment is worth it!
I struggle with finding the right shoes. Any recommendations for overpronation?
Make sure to get a proper fitting at a specialty running store. It made a huge difference for me!
